name: Legends of Canvas
description:
This game was made as part of a university project using a custom made JavaScript Game Framework.

The player character is controlled by using the arrow keys to move and the space bar to attack.

Team:

AlekKef and Dr4g0nsoul.

Assets used:

  • ManaSpace Font: [ codeman38 | cody@zone38.net | http://www.zone38.net/  ]
  • Background music: [Kevin Horton | http://www.vgmpf.com/Wiki/index.php/The_Legend_of_Zelda_(NES) ]
  • Sound effects: [HelpTheWretched | http://www.ZeldaSounds.com ]
  • Sprites and Backgrounds: [124scratch | https://www.spriters-resource.com/nes/legendofzelda/ ] 
  • Original Game: Nintendo of Japan
